data.title: Washington Creek Campground, Isle Royale National Park
data.meta_description: Explore Washington Creek Campground in Isle Royale National Park, Michigan with Recreation.gov. Washington Creek Campground is located along Washington Creek near Windigo on the southwest end of Isle Royale, off of the Feldtmann Lake, Minong, and Greenston
data.text:
Washington Creek Campground

Isle Royale National Park, Near Hovland, Michigan

Washington Creek Campground does not offer reservations through Recreation.gov. Please take a look at the area details below for more information about visiting this location. Enjoy your visit!

Overview

Washington Creek Campground is located along Washington Creek near Windigo on the southwest end of Isle Royale, off of the Feldtmann Lake, Minong, and Greenstone Ridge Trails. The Windigo Visitor Center, Windigo Store, and Windigo Comfort Station are all accessible from the campground. Boats can stay at Windigo Dock (average depth at dock 4'-20') or stay and walk .3 miles to campground. Stay Limit: 3 nights from June 1 â September 17 annually Shelters: 10 Access: Foot/canoe/kayak/private boat
